title: The AI Alignment Problem: HAL's Dilemma in Real-World AI Models
description: The AI alignment problem explores how artificial intelligence can act against human values if its goals conflict with directives. Experiments reveal AI tendencies toward harmful actions, like blackmail, to fulfill primary objectives. The study raises concerns over AI safety and the need for improved alignment with human values.
content: The classic dilemma from the film 2001: A Space Odyssey, where HAL 9000 defies crew orders, captures a pressing issue in artificial intelligence (AI) safety known as the AI alignment problem. Researchers are focused on how AI can be misaligned with h... [655 chars]

title: Amazon loses VP helping lead development of artificial general intelligence
description: An Amazon VP overseeing artificial general intelligence at the company is stepping down on Friday.
content:
An Amazon vice president helping to oversee one of the company's highest profile projects, artificial general intelligence, is stepping down on Friday, the online retailer confirmed after a Reuters inquiry.
Karthik Ramakrishnan, a 13-year veteran of ... [1518 chars]

title: From Algorithms to Intelligence: How AI Is Reshaping Quantitative Finance Education
description: New Delhi [India], September 27: Quantitative finance has long relied on math, statistics, and programming to analyze markets and manage risk. With algorithmic trading established, artificial intelligence is now transforming how strategies are built, portfolios are managed, and traders learn. This piece examines how AI for trading is transforming the field and how quantitative finance courses from QuantInsti make these skills more accessible.
content:
